matches.intro:
Eliza Weaver is an energetic entrepreneur with a passion for running and technology. She's working on launching her own app and leveraging her MBA knowledge along with AI coding tools to bring her vision to life.

Fun fact: Both of you are interested in launching something new, with Eliza focused on her app and you potentially exploring a launch in your areas of expertise.
